name: Tonga
overview: A platform game. Collect hearts and locate the hidden switch before finishing the level. A PD game from Gunter Meister in 1992. There once was the land of Tortiga, That's where the Nassars lived. Their chief was called Tonga. Now it happened that the sorcerer Orrara kidnapped Tonga's bride and held her prisoner in a secret dungeon. Tonga must try to find the dungeon. He has to face many dangers. He has to pick up objects that are hanging in the air on his way. There are secret switches that allow you to progress. Dangerous monsters cross his path that he has to avoid. Invisible traps complicate his journey.
